name: Sale
pages: The "Sale" rule allows you to give all players a discount for a predefined period of time. It's functionally similar to the $(l:trade_rules/discount_list)Discounts$() rule, but applying to all players for a limited period of time.

pages.text: This rule has three inputs of note. The text box in the top-left allows you to define the discount percentage (e.g. input of 10 is a 10% discount).$(br2)At the very bottom is a time input that determines how long the sale will last.

pages: In-between these two inputs is the Start/Stop button that toggles the sales state.$(br2)While the sale is $(l)inactive$() this button will allow you to actually start the sale, and the text above it will state the currently defined sale duration.$(br2)While the sale is $(l)active$() it will allow you to stop the sale early, and the text above will list the time remaining until the sale is over.
